pages.title: Quitoxic Reeds
pages.text: Grows exclusively in Swamps and seems to devour Clay as a form of nutrient.

A purple glittering powder can be extracted from the stems of the alien-looking plant by crushing it with an anvil.$(br)Smell and consistency are very unusual when rubbed between your fingers.$(br2)$(italic)...wait a moment, what are fingers?
只生长在沼泽中，似乎吞食粘土作为一种营养物质。
pages.title: 祛毒甘蔗

pages.text: 用铁砧将这种看起来像外星人的植物的茎压碎，可以从中提取出一种紫色的闪闪发光的粉末。$(br)当你用手指摩擦时，气味和稠度很不寻常。。。。$(br2)$(italic)等等，手指是什么？
